name: Basketball Fundamentals
description: Basketball Fundamentals focus on the skill sets of dribbling, shooting, and passing the basketball. Some game time drills will be introduced such as fast breaks and boxing out for rebounds. The goal is to help these young ballers develop their love for the game.
fullDescription: Basketball Fundamentals focus on the skill sets of dribbling, shooting, and passing the basketball. Some game time drills will be introduced such as fast breaks and boxing out for rebounds. The goal is to help these young ballers develop their love for the game.
whatTheyOffer: Basketball Fundamentals focus on the skill sets of dribbling, shooting, and passing the basketball. Some game time drills will be introduced such as fast breaks and boxing out for rebounds. The goal is to help these young ballers develop their love for the game.
howToGetIt: Register online or call the registration hotline at (628) 652-2900
agency: San Francisco Recreation and Park Department
